name: extended-yo-generator
description: Provides packages for executing and testing extended implementations of the yeoman-generator.

scripts.build: npm run copy-files && npm run compile
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.watch: concurrently --raw "npm run copy-files -- --watch | shusher" "npm run compile -- --watch"
scripts.clean: npm run compile -- --clean && lerna run clean
scripts.lint: npm run lint-local && lerna run lint
scripts.lint-ide: npm run lint-local-ide && lerna run lint-ide
scripts.prepare: lerna bootstrap --ignore-scripts && npm run patchTypeScript && npm run rebuild
scripts.patchTypeScript: ts-patch install && ts-patch --persist && lerna run patchTypeScript
